definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
abbr. for Syria 敘利亞|叙利亚[Xu4 li4 ya4]

sentences.english: To narrate is to give an account of what happened or is happening.
sentences.chinese: 記敘文講述的是發生在當前或過去事情的經過。

sentences.english: Of the various forms of discourse narration is perhaps the most familiar to us.
sentences.chinese: 記敘文是我們最爲熟悉的一種寫作文體。

sentences.english: And then you get to the birth narratives in Matthew, the stories of the Baby Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 然後你讀到了馬太福音中，記敘耶穌誕生的故事。

sentences.english: Sequencing events from a narrative story.
sentences.chinese: 給一篇記敘文中的事件排序。

sentences.english: Mr Taylor recounts one of the pivotal moments in China’s civil war.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒記敘了中國內戰中的一個關鍵時刻。

sentences.english: The following paragraph is a sample narrative for the example plan.
sentences.chinese: 下面一段就是例子計劃的簡單記敘文。

sentences.english: Yes, we dabble in literature, and more generally, narrative.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我們涉足文學，或者通俗點說是記敘文。

sentences.english: This thesis applies the theory of situation models to the translation of narratives.
sentences.chinese: 本文運用情景模型理論來分析記敘文的翻譯。

sentences.english: "Iron Soldiers" gives a good account of the nature of the battle at Medina Ridge.
sentences.chinese: 《鋼鐵戰士》對麥迪那山戰鬥本身進行了很好的記敘。

sentences.english: At its simplest, narration is the telling of a story, which involves characters and ongoing actions.
sentences.chinese: 簡言之，記敘文就是講故事，包括人物和故事情節。
有記敘性的，精彩紛呈的記敘故事。
有記敘性的，精彩紛呈的記敘故事。

definition: Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
scholar of the rationalist school of Neo-Confucianism 理學|理学[Li3 xue2]
to comment/a point by point commentary
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
to look at sth through a bamboo tube/to have a restricted view
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
